attributes.action: Brexit deal - Allow the public a vote on Deal or No Deal.
attributes.additional_details:
Rather than Parliment focusing their efforts on an orderly withdrawal from the EU on 29th March they've focused on political point scoring to the detriment of our nation and are an embarrassment, they should be ashamed!
The majority voted to leave and not for a half in/half out option. Since 2916 parliament has consistently gone against the will of the electorate and is now talking about extending past 29 March and has even threatened for not to leave at all!

This needs to end on 29 March.
attributes.background:
Give the public the final say on Deal or No Deal and leave on 29 March as promised!

Parliament has lost the nation's trust. Rather than EU withdrawal they've focused on political point scoring to the detriment of our nation's reputation. 
Their decision to reject No Deal is not theirs to make!
